trans-unit.id: Using existing synced device open Brave Settings and navigate to “Devices & Settings”, tap ‘+’ to add a new device and reveal sync code.
trans-unit.source: Using existing synced device open Brave Settings and navigate to “Devices & Settings”, tap ‘+’ to add a new device and reveal sync code.
trans-unit.target: 既存の同期済みデバイスを使って「Brave設定」を開き、「デバイスと設定」を選択します。「+」をタップして新しいデバイスを追加し、同期コードを表示します。
trans-unit.note: Sync to existing device description
Version number of Brave shown in settings
Button label to temporarily continue to the site from the certificate error page

trans-unit.id: Warning: we can't confirm your connection to this website is secure.
trans-unit.source: Warning: we can't confirm your connection to this website is secure.
trans-unit.target: 警告: このウェブサイトへの接続が安全であることが確認できません。

trans-unit.id: You can choose to show a popup to pick your password manager, or have the selected one open automatically.
trans-unit.source: You can choose to show a popup to pick your password manager, or have the selected one open automatically.
trans-unit.target: ポップアップからパスワードマネージャーを選択するか、選択したパスワードマネージャーを自動で開くかについて選ぶことができます。

trans-unit.target: 接続がプライベートではありません
trans-unit.note: Title on the certificate error page

trans-unit.id: Your most visited sites will show up here.
trans-unit.source: Your most visited sites will show up here.
trans-unit.target: 最も多く訪問したサイトはここに表示されます。
trans-unit.note: Description label for the empty Top Sites state.
Relative time for a tab that was visited within the last few moments.
Relative date for dates older than a month and less than two months.
Description for a date more than a week ago, but less than a month ago.
Title for password row in Login Detail View
Accessibility label for read article in reading list. It's a past participle - functions as an adjective.
Relative date for date in past week.
Relative date for date older than a minute.
Accessibility label for unread article in reading list. It's a past participle - functions as an adjective.

trans-unit.id: Help make Brave better by sending usage statistics and crash reports to us.
trans-unit.source: Help make Brave better by sending usage statistics and crash reports to us.
trans-unit.target: 利用統計とクラッシュレポートを送ってBraveの改善に協力してください。
